root: ^Morning Matt - He glances at your appearance -
^I'm wearing clothes, that should be enough shouldn't it?
^I know, I couldn't find my uniform this morning

KindOfExcuse: ^That's just a sign you're disorganised, you should prioritise the more important things you need to do in the day first.
NotExcuse: ^Matt, you look like you walked into the wardrobe of a high school degenerate then left witrh whatever stuck to you.
^A bit of advice, don't follow Dillon's fashion tips.
NotTalkingAboutThatAlteration: ^Reguardless, your clothes aren't the only thing I'm referring to. You're slouching and moping about.
^You still haven't gotten over what happened yet have you?
NotTalkingAboutThat: ^Reguardless, your clothes aren't the only thing I'm referring to. You're slouching and moping about.
^You're still stuck on what happened aren't you?
ItsBeenAges: ^Mathew it's been how long now? The way you betrayed Cyrus's little girl was cowardly and pathetic but even she was able to move on from what happened.
^You need to get your act together and actually TRY to move forward.
DoItForYourself: ^Do it for yourself if not for her.
TryHarder: ^From the looks of things, you need to try harder. You can start by making sure you get your work done and avoid slacking off. - He gestures to Dillon -
DoesntLookLikeIt: ^Look it's obvious you're not over it, you can't deny that. What I don't understand is why you're still acting like she'll come back to you after what you did?
DontKnow: ^You're a grown man Matt, people can only be so patient with immature behaviour.
^I suggest you start acting your age for once and get your life together, you can start by getting your work done instead of getting lost in the clouds.
Typical: ^Typical of you isn't it Mathew? Still "working through things"? How long did you expect she was going to wait for you? Years? Decades? The world doesn't revolve around you you know?
^The sooner you realise that, the better off you'll be.
Pathetic: ^Because it's pathetic seeing you drag yourself around like a toddler having a tantrum. You don't get to be the one who recieves sympathy for acting like a coward, Cyrus's daughter deserved better and you know it.
StartGettingLifeTogether: ^You need to get your life together and stop living in the past, maybe you'll finally learn to act your age and we won't have to have this discussion in the future.
^I'll be seeing you Matt, don't slack off, the boss won't take kindly to it if he catches you again.
